channel.title: Can't see other players/invisible
channel.description: I am currently making the fight caves, and i want it like runescape, where u can't see other people, and i don't mean just not see them, i want them to not be there at all. I want you to be able to kill ur own npcs. If anyone knows how to make it so u are the only one there and no one else can see u and u can't see them. If anyone knows how to do this i would greatly appreciate it.

item.title: Can't see other players/invisible
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

It is the same place, it is the fight caves, i just like it like runescape where u are the only one there, so basically everyone is in a seperate one, but really the same.

Read full topic
